title: Solar-Powered Yellow & Red Warning Light
body:
üîß Key Features:

üåû Solar Powered: Equipped with a high-efficiency solar panel, it charges during the day and automatically lights up at night ‚Äî no wiring or batteries required.

üí° Ultra-Bright LED Illumination: Features high-intensity yellow LEDs for maximum visibility, ensuring clear signaling even in low-light or foggy conditions.

üïí Automatic ON/OFF Function: Integrated light sensor detects ambient light and activates the unit at dusk, conserving power during daylight hours.

üíß Weather-Resistant Design: Built with a durable polycarbonate lens and a sealed base, this light withstands rain, dust, and extreme temperatures.

üõ†Ô∏è Easy Installation: Lightweight and compact with mounting holes, it can be quickly installed on barricades, poles, fences, or traffic cones.

 

üìê Specifications:

  • Light Color:¬† Yellow & Red
  • Power Source: Solar Panel (integrated)
  • Battery Type: Rechargeable Ni-MH or Li-ion (built-in)
  • Lighting Mode: Flashing / Steady (varies by model)
  • Visibility Range: Up to 500 meters
  • Material: Polycarbonate lens, ABS base
  • Mounting Surface: mount with screw holes
  • Waterproof: Rating IP65

 

üöß Ideal For:

  • Roadside safety
  • Traffic cones & barricades
  • Construction sites
  • Parking lots
  • Marine docks
  • Airports and railways

title: Solar Flower LED Warning Light ‚Äì 8-Head Amber Flashing Signal
body:
Key Features:

  • Unique Flower Design: Eye-catching 8-lens circular layout mimics a flower pattern to increase attention and improve warning effectiveness.
  • Bright Amber LEDs: High-intensity amber lights provide strong visibility in both day and night conditions, even in low-light environments.
  • Solar Powered: Integrated solar panel charges automatically in sunlight, eliminating the need for wiring or battery replacements.
  • Durable Construction: Made with high-impact, weather-resistant plastic in a vibrant yellow casing for excellent visibility and resilience in outdoor conditions.
  • Automatic Operation: Built-in light sensor enables auto ON at dusk and OFF at dawn for effortless use.
  • Energy Efficient: Long-lasting LED technology consumes minimal power, ensuring extended operation on a single charge.
  • Easy Installation: Compact, lightweight design allows for quick mounting on traffic cones, barricades, poles, or flat surfaces using built-in mounting points or accessories.

Specifications:

  • Material: High-impact plastic
  • LED Color: Amber
  • Number of LED Heads: 8
  • Power Source: Solar rechargeable battery
  • Operation Mode: Flashing or steady (based on model)
  • Visibility Range: Up to 1000 meters (depending on conditions)
  • Dimensions: Approx. 385 x 388 x 10 mm
  • Weather Resistance: IP65 or higher (assumed based on usage)

Applications:

  • Roadside construction and maintenance zones
  • Hazard or caution marking
  • Emergency and breakdown signals
  • Pedestrian and traffic management
  • Industrial safety areas

title: Solar Double Flashing Warning Light for Traffic Cones
body:
Powered by a high-efficiency solar panel, it charges during the day and operates automatically at night, ensuring continuous performance without the need for wiring or frequent battery changes. The durable ABS plastic body and weather-resistant design make it suitable for all outdoor conditions.

This warning light is specially designed to fit securely on top of standard traffic cones, barricades, or other safety equipment, making it an essential tool for enhancing visibility in low-light or hazardous environments.

Key Features:

  • Dual LED Flashing Lenses ‚Äì Bright alternating flashes for maximum attention.
  • Solar Powered ‚Äì Charges during the day, works automatically at night.
  • Easy Installation ‚Äì Fits directly on standard traffic cones and barricades.
  • Weather-Resistant Construction ‚Äì Durable ABS plastic for outdoor use.
  • Long-Lasting Performance ‚Äì Energy-efficient LEDs with extended lifespan.
  • Automatic Operation ‚Äì Light sensor activates at dusk and deactivates at dawn.

Specifications:

  • Material: High-impact ABS plastic
  • Light Source: High-intensity LED
  • Power Supply: Solar rechargeable battery
  • Lighting Mode: Alternating double flashing
  • Color: Yellow (Amber)
  • Visibility Distance: Up to 500 meters (depending on weather conditions)
  • Waterproof Rating: IP65 (Weatherproof)
  • Dimensions: Approx. 280mm (H) √ó 200mm (W)
  • Weight: Lightweight for easy handling

Applications:

  • Road construction and maintenance sites
  • Traffic control and safety checkpoints
  • Parking lot safety
  • Emergency response and hazard marking
  • Industrial and warehouse safety zones

title: Heavy-Duty Amber Revolving Warning Light ‚Äì 12V Magnetic Base with Cigarette Lighter Plug
body:
Key Features:

üî∏ Bright Amber Illumination: Equipped with a high-intensity rotating LED enclosed in a vibrant amber dome, this warning light provides 360¬∞ visibility to alert others and increase on-site safety.

üî∏ Sturdy Magnetic Base: Features a strong magnetic base that securely mounts to any metal surface‚Äîperfect for temporary or mobile applications. No permanent installation required.

üî∏ Plug-and-Play Design: Powered via a 12V DC cigarette lighter plug for instant operation. The coiled power cord extends for flexible placement, making setup fast and hassle-free.

üî∏ Durable Construction: Crafted with a tough polycarbonate dome and impact-resistant housing to withstand harsh weather and rugged environments. Built to last on demanding job sites.

üî∏ Classic Rotating Beacon: The internal rotating mirror mechanism mimics traditional emergency beacons, providing dynamic and attention-grabbing motion, visible even in daylight.

 

Specifications:

  • Color: Amber
  • Voltage: 12V DC
  • Mounting: Magnetic base
  • Power Connection: Cigarette lighter plug with coiled cord
  • Dome Material: High-impact polycarbonate
  • Lighting Mechanism: Rotating reflector bulb

 

Use Cases:

  • Construction vehicles,
  • roadside assistance,
  • tow trucks,
  • forklifts,
  • plows,
  • security patrols,
  • warehouse vehicles

title: Heavy-Duty Revolving Warning Light ‚Äì Yellow (12V) ‚Äì Magnetic Mount
body:
Key Features:

  • High Visibility Amber Dome: The transparent yellow polycarbonate cover ensures excellent light transmission while being impact-resistant and UV-stabilized for extended outdoor use.
  • Powerful Rotating Beam: Equipped with a motorized rotating reflector system that produces a bright, revolving light for optimal visibility in all directions.
  • Universal Voltage (12V DC): Compatible with most vehicle electrical systems, ideal for cars, trucks, construction equipment, and agricultural machinery.
  • Magnetic Base: Features a strong magnetic base that securely attaches to any metal surface‚Äîno permanent installation required.
  • Cigarette Lighter Plug: Convenient plug-and-play operation with an integrated coiled power cable and a standard 12V car cigarette lighter plug, making it easy to move and use across different vehicles.
  • Durable Construction: Built with high-quality materials to withstand tough environments including dust, rain, and vibration.

Specifications:

  • Color: Amber/Yellow
  • Voltage: 12V DC
  • Mounting Type: Magnetic Base
  • Lens Material: Polycarbonate
  • Base Material: Heavy-duty ABS
  • Cable Type: Coiled power cord with 12V plug
  • Light Type: Halogen bulb with rotating reflector
  • Dimensions: Approx. 185mm x 134mm x 124mm (L x W x H)

Applications:

  • Emergency and roadside assistance vehicles
  • Construction and maintenance trucks
  • Security patrols and escort vehicles
  • Farm equipment and industrial machinery

title: AAA SAFE Safeman- Full Body Safety Harness,  Rope, Adjustable waist, Thigh wrap, Plastic Belt Back support, Scafolding Hook - SBLT-02
body:
Features and Benefits:

  • Comfort and Support:
    • Built-in Padding: Padding on shoulders, back, and legs enhances comfort during extended wear and distributes weight more evenly.
    • Adjustable Chest Strap & Thigh Straps: Allow for a customized and secure fit, crucial for fall protection.
    • Comfortable Sit Strap: Provides additional comfort and support while suspended.

 

  • Fall Arrest Functionality:
    • D-ring Located at Back: This is the standard location for the primary attachment point for a lanyard or lifeline used in fall arrest applications.
    • Single Hook: This is a significant concern for fall arrest. Safety regulations (e.g., OSHA) typically mandate double lanyards for fall arrest to minimize risk in case one lanyard fails. A single hook setup might not meet safety requirements for fall arrest.

 

  • Possible Use Cases:
    • Fall Arrest (with Back D-ring): If the harness is certified for fall arrest, the back D-ring could be used with a double lanyard and lifeline for this purpose. However, confirmation is crucial.
    • The harness and hook are part of a certified work positioning system.
    • You receive proper training on safe use within that system.
    • Relevant regulations (e.g., OSHA standards) permit a single hook for your specific work positioning application.

 

  • Safety Considerations:
    • Double Lanyards for Fall Arrest: Always prioritize using a double lanyard setup with a certified fall arrest system for fall protection applications. The back D-ring is the designated point for this.

title: Venus ‚Äì V-7800-ABEK1P2R Chemical Filter-I Multigas & P2 Pre-Filter
body:
Half mask Face-piece in soft TPE material (Thermoplastic Electrometric) in grey colour. It is equipped with dual filter which ensures better breathing comfort. Produced from non-allergic, Soft and odourless material to ensure high comfort. Light in weight. Easy to use and well balanced. Economical. Low maintenance. Promotes easy communication. Exhalation valve to allow efficient escape of exhaled air containing CO2. Sweat port in face piece for hot and humid environment. Gas Filter and Particle Pre- filter can be combined. Pull type strong, adjustable elastic gives snug fit yet relives strap pressure.

title: Safety Net Fall Protection (Copy)
body:
Knotless System-S Safety Net confirming to EN 1263-1 (Rope-edged
safety net) made of 5.0mm High tenacity poly propylene rope.
Square Mesh, edged all round with 12mm, 30kN PP Rope.
Energy absorption approx. 4.4kJ. Net Class A2
GS Test Certificate 7100004 (Replaces 3100004)

title: Heavy-Duty Chain Mail Gloves: Cut-Resistant Protection for Your Hands
body:
Cut Resistant Gloves - Detailed Breakdown

This description highlights a cut-resistant glove designed to protect your hands while working with sharp objects or food. Here's a breakdown of the key features:

  • Material and Protection:
    • High-Strength Polyethylene Fibers And Stainless Steel Wire: These materials are claimed to be 10 times stronger than regular gloves, offering enhanced protection against cuts.

 

  • Applications:
    • Food Handling (FDA compliant): The materials are said to be FDA compliant, allowing direct contact with food. This makes them suitable for kitchen tasks like cutting, slicing, shucking, and peeling.
    • Other Uses: The gloves are also mentioned for gardening, mechanic work, fishing, and construction work (check suitability for specific tasks).

 

  • Durability and Comfort:
    • Dense, tear-resistant material: The gloves are claimed to be more durable than regular gloves and resist tearing easily.
    • Breathable material: The material supposedly allows breathability to keep hands dry and comfortable during extended wear.

 

  • Safety and Grip:
    • Flat internal construction and adjustable wrist clasp: This design aims to provide a comfortable and secure fit.
    • Wet and dry grip: The gloves are advertised to offer good grip on both wet and dry surfaces, important for handling slippery food items.

 

Additional Information:

  • Package Includes:
    • One stainless steel wire mesh glove for a single hand.
    • A free nylon cotton glove for additional hand protection.
    • Cleaning: Easy to clean with water and soap or even machine washable.\

 

  • Overall:
    • These gloves could be a good option for Food Preparation and other tasks requiring moderate cut protection. However, for heavy-duty applications or tasks requiring the highest Cut Resistance, consider researching gloves with verifiable cut resistance levels based on relevant safety standards.

title: ANTI-SLIP TAPE - SELF ADHESIVE HAZARD STICKER TAPE FOR FLOOR STEPS
body:
Features and Benefits:

  • Reduce Slips and Stay Safe with Anti-Slip Tape (2" x 5 Meters)
  • Prevents Accidents: Provides extra traction on slippery surfaces like floors, stairs, and walkways, reducing the risk of falls.
  • Strong Adhesive: Self-adhesive backing ensures easy application and stays secure.
  • Removable Without Residue: Removes cleanly without leaving any sticky residue behind.
  • Versatile Use: Suitable for indoor and outdoor use on various surfaces like tile, concrete, and metal.
  • High Visibility: Available in bright colors (red/white & yellow/black) to act as a visual reminder to be cautious.
  • Perfect Size: 2 inch width covers high-traffic areas effectively, and 5-meter length allows for multiple applications.

This product information effectively highlights the key features and benefits of the anti-slip tape, including size and color options.
